attributes.action: Give nurses more of a pay rise then the insult of a pay rise they just got
attributes.background: My mum is a nurse and works so hard just to get the pay that hardly covers the cost of living and can only just keep a roof over our head they recently had a pay rise but this pay rise is so minamal it is so pointless and degrading it’s actually disgusting that they don’t get appreciated enough

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about nurses' pay, but we're not sure exactly what pay increase you'd like to see for nurses. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
